segments.text: Sometimes you look like brains , and sometimes you are simple a Barbie Doll .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t know whether I am a Barbie Doll or you are one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I am a Barbie Doll , but I won ’ t do Barbie Doll things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am not going to flog a dead horse . Let get down to our brass tasks and tidy these things up .
segments.speaker: S2
